<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Tiefling](/Monsters.aspx?ID=331)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Tieflings are planar scions with fiendish blood. One of the most common types is pitborn, who bear a demonic corruption infesting their mortal bloodline. Some strive to live above their forebear’s fiendish reputation, but many, such as this tiefling adept, simply accept their label and delve fully into evil.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/PlanarScion_TieflingAdept.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Tiefling Adept](/Monsters.aspx?ID=331)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 262</row>

**Perception** +6; darkvision

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Abyss Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +9, [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +9, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +9, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +7, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +9, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +6, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +9, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +2

**Con** +0

**Int** +4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Explorer's Clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=2), [spellbook](/Equipment.aspx?ID=53), [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 29

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
staff +6 ([two-handed 1d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d6 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 piercing

**Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 21, attack +11
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244)
- **2nd**
[Flaming Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=121), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164)

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 17
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59)

**Drain Bonded Item** <actions string="Free Action" />  **Frequency** Once per day; **Requirements** The adept hasn’t acted yet on this turn. **Effect** The adept expends the power stored in its staff. This gives the adept the ability to cast one prepared spell it had already previously cast today (choosing a different spell level each time), without spending a spell slot. The adept must still Cast the Spell and meet the spell’s other requirements.

</column>
